parameters.name: SLSGroupConfig
parameters.description:
The configurations of the Logstore group.

Valid values of N: 1 to 25.

parameters.name: SLSGroupDescription
parameters.description: The description of the Logstore group.

parameters.name: SLSGroupName
parameters.description:
The name of the Logstore group.

For information about how to obtain the name of a Logstore group, see [DescribeHybridMonitorSLSGroup](~~429526~~).
